pages.text: 251 East Bay Street, Charleston, SC 29401 map marker pin Reservations Make some memories Reserve your table, we look forward to seeing you. reserve our drinks Let us pour you one Enjoy a moment to yourself in a relaxing, welcoming atmosphere drinks PRIVATE EVENTS White glove service for all special occasions parties Reviews review by - Yelp Christina S: Great drinks and atmosphere! Will was our server and did a great job hosting. Highly recommend for anyone wanting some pre- dinner drinks or something special to do with friends. review by - Yelp Taylor A: Must be a big secret because we were the only ones in! Super service, great wine list. All around fun experience. If you're feeling bold, ask if anything spooky has ever happened. review by - Yelp David J: A very cool, hidden gem. Mainly a wine and champagne bar but cocktails are available and the one I got was amazing. An espresso martini made with egg whites for froth and real espresso.. review by - Yelp Savannah P: Absolutely amazing! Must try!! They have a beautiful and vast selection of wine and make you feel very welcomed.
